channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- exacqVision Web Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- exacqVision Web Service

item.title: CVE-2021-27664|2024-08-03T21:26:10.783Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20web%20service
item.description: Under certain configurations an unauthenticated remote user could be given access to credentials stored in the exacqVision Server.

item.title: CVE-2021-27665|2024-08-03T21:26:10.799Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20web%20service
item.description: An unauthenticated remote user could exploit a potential integer overflow condition in the exacqVision Server with a specially crafted script and cause denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2021-27659|2024-08-03T21:26:10.663Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20web%20service
item.description: exacqVision Web Service 21.03 does not sufficiently validate, filter, escape, and/or encode user-controllable input before it is placed in output that is used as a web page that is served to other users.
